title: Persona 3 Dengeki Comic Anthology
alternative_title: ペルソナ3電撃コミックアンソロジー
status: ペルソナ3電撃コミックアンソロジー
description:
Description :
        A collection of stories by various artists.

1. Carpe Diem by TSUKIMOTO Telaco.
The MC - Minato - bought a blue butterfly comb for Aegis during the class trip to Kyoto, which has since been lost somewhere in the school. Ryoji and Minato end up searching for it. ~Spoilers regarding Ryoji~

2. We are Friends by TAMIYA Komo.
Upon returning to his room, the MC discovers it has turned into the Velvet Room. However, the elevator gets stuck and won't move until repairs are made, allowing for Pharos to meet Elizabeth and Igor.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 2: Connected Hearts, Infinite Power
